attributes.action: Stop BSkyB from taking Freeview bandwidth for a new subscription TV service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BSkyB is to remove its Sky Three, Sky News and Sky Sports News channels from Freeview in advance of the launch this summer of a new pay-TV service on digital terrestial television. However, none of the existing digital terrestial television set-top boxes or TVs will be capable of receiving the proposed new service. Existing "Freeview" bandwidth should be retained for "free to view" television services.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
